pages.text: All Extra-Terrestrial vehicles require fuel in order to advance.Fuel of cource cannot be some primitive substance like wood or coal.'Rocket fuel' needs something a bit more EXPLOSIVE.$(br2)Hence this entry explaining where to find resources and how to make rocket fuel.

pages.title: Oil wells
pages.text: Oil wells are naturally occuring spouts that can be mainly found in the Ocean.There will be a singular shout with multiple sources surrounding it.$(br2)It is recommended that one should bring multiple buckets or ample fluid storage to make enough fuel for all intergalactic adventures

pages.title: FUEL
pages.text: Fuel is the liquid made by processing Oil in a refinery.For every bucket of oil put into the refinery,1 bucket of fuel is returned.%(br2)It is used to power all rockets and rovers.

pages.title: Fuel refinery
pages.text: As stated earlier, this machine powered by FE can produce fuel my consuming oil.
